Hello all,

First time posting our deals here so hope it all goes well.
[Vert Hosting](http://verthosting.com/) LTD is a New Zealand based, [registered company](http://www.business.govt.nz/companies/app/ui/pages/companies/3788076?backurl=%2Fcompanies%2Fapp%2Fui%2Fpages%2Fcompanies%2Fsearch%3Fmode%3Dstandard%26type%3Dentities%26q%3Dvert%2520hosting) selling Xen PV VPS and Minecraft servers.
We offer servers in both France and Germany, and hope to expand to other parts of the world in the near future.

To view all the VPSs we sell at our locations, here are the links:
-France: [https://my.verthosting.com/cart.php?gid=1](https://my.verthosting.com/cart.php?gid=1)
-Germany: [https://my.verthosting.com/cart.php?gid=3](https://my.verthosting.com/cart.php?gid=3)

The deal we're running today is our **Xen 1024** plan at $7 USD a month recurring using the code **CHEAP1024**.
Here are the specifications of the Xen 1024 plan:
-1 fair-share CPU cores
-1024 MB of dedicated RAM
-50 GB of disk space
-850 GB of transfer
-100 megabit uplink
-Order now: [France](https://my.verthosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=2) [Germany](https://my.verthosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=15)

Please note that our VPS servers are not automatically deployed so as to prevent fraudulent orders or payments. It may take up to 24 hours to process your order.
Firefox users may have issues visiting our WHMCS panel as the SSL certificates are causing issues at the moment. Please add an exception to your browser or use a different browser.

If you have any inquiries, please open a ticket on the 'Contact Us' section of our main site.
